package.name: tholzschuh-maths
package.author: Tim Holzschuh
package.description: A collection of unicode symbols often used by working mathematicians.
package.title: Tim's 𝓜𝒜𝐓𝖧 snippets

manifest.name: tholzschuh-maths
manifest.title: Tim's 𝓜𝒜𝐓𝖧 snippets
manifest.description: A collection of unicode symbols often used by working mathematicians.
manifest.author: Tim Holzschuh

packageRepo.readme:
# What's this about?
This package ships a variety of unicode symbols commonly used by working mathematicians in a coherent syntax roughly based on LaTeX.

# Why would I need this?
It is much easier to communicate about mathematics i.e. in a math discord or via email with a collaborator when you read statements like 

    π₋ₙ(map(Σ₊Y, 𝐇(A))) ⋍ Hⁿ(Y, A)

compared to the currently widely adopted

    \pi_{-n}(map(\Sigma_{+}Y, \mathbf{H}(A))) \simeq \mathsf{H}^{n}(Y, A)

# What's inside?

The basic syntax for maths symbols is ```:trigger:```, where 'trigger' is the maths command in question.
For example:

    - ```:to:```     ⟶ ```⟶```
    - ```:epi:```    ⟶ ```↠```
    - ```:mono:```   ⟶ ```⮩``` 
    - ```:infty:```  ⟶ ```∞```
    - ```:calC:```   ⟶ ```𝓒```
    - ```:Lambda:``` ⟶ ```Λ```
    - ```X:_1:```    ⟶ ```X₁```

Here's an exhaustive list of symbols that are currently supported together with their ```trigger```.

### Arrows
| Trigger | Replace |
| ------- | ------- |
|:to:|⟶|
|:arrow_right:|⟶|
|:ot:|⟵|
|:arrow_left:|⟵|
|:arrow_up:|↑|
|:arrow_down:|↓|
|:arrow_left_and_right:|⇄|
|:arrow_leftright:|⟷|
|:to_short:|→|
|:epi:|↠|
|:epi_left:|↞|
|:mono:|⮩|
|:mono_left:|⮨|
|:acts:|↷|
|:acts_left:|↶|
|:auto:|⟲|
|:simto:|⭇|
|:simot:|⭁|
|:emb_open:|⇴|
|:emb_closed:|↛|
|:mapsto:|⟼|
|:mapsto_short:|↦|
|:rrarrow:|⇉|
|:rrrarrow:|⇶|
|:arroww:|⟹|
|:arrowww:|⇛|
|:arrow_squiggly:|⇝|
|:arrow_squiggly_left:|⇜|
|:arrow_squiggly_long:|⟿|

### Logic & Category Theory
| Trigger | Replace |
| ------- | ------- |
|:forall:|∀|
|:exists:|∃|
|:not_exists:|∄|
|:not_equals:|≠|
|:and:|∧|
|:or:|∨|
|:xor:|⩛|
|:not:|¬|
|:impl:|⇒|
|:simeq:|⋍|
|:not_simeq:|≄|
|:cong:|≌|
|:coloneqq:|≔|
|:eqqcolon:|≕|
|:leq:|≦|
|:geq:|≧|
|:ladj:|⊣|
|:radj:|⊢|
|:times:|×|
|:point:|∗|
|:circ:|∘|
|:prod:|∏|
|:coprod:|∐|
|:sum:|∑|

### Set Theory
| Trigger | Replace |
| ------- | ------- |
|:cap:|∩|
|:cup:|∪|
|:empty:|∅|
|:in:|∈|
|:not_in:|∉|
|:ni:|∋|
|:not_ni:|∌|
|:subset:|⊂|
|:superset:|⊃|

### Greek
| Trigger | Replace |
| ------- | ------- |

|:Alpha:|Α|
|:beta:|β|
|:Beta:|Β|
|:gamma:|γ|
|:Gamma:|Γ|
|:delta:|δ|
|:Delta:|Δ|
|:epsilon:|ε|
|:Epsilon:|Ε|
|:zeta:|ζ|
|:Zeta:|Ζ|
|:eta:|η|
|:Eta:|Η|
|:theta:|θ|
|:Theta:|Θ|
|:iota:|ι|
|:Iota:|Ι|
|:kappa:|κ|
|:Iota:|Κ|
|:lambda:|λ|
|:Lambda:|Λ|
|:mu:|μ|
|:Mu:|Μ|
|:nu:|ν|
|:Nu:|Ν|
|:xi:|ξ|
|:Xi:|Ξ|
|:omicron:|ο|
|:Omicron:|Ο|
|:pi:|π|
|:Pi:|Π|
|:rho:|ρ|
|:Rho:|Ρ|
|:sigma:|σ|
|:Sigma:|Σ|
|:tau:|τ|
|:Tau:|Τ|
|:upsilon:|υ|
|:Upsilon:|Υ|
|:phi:|φ|
|:varphi:|ϕ|
|:Phi:|Φ|
|:chi:|χ|
|:Chi:|Χ|
|:psi:|ψ|
|:Psi:|Ψ|
|:omega:|ω|
|:Omega:|Ω|

### Latin lowercase superscripts
| Trigger | Replace |
| ------- | ------- |
|:^a:|ᵃ|
|:^b:|ᵇ|
|:^c:|ᶜ|
|:^d:|ᵈ|
|:^e:|ᵉ|
|:^f:|ᶠ|
|:^g:|ᵍ|
|:^h:|ʰ|
|:^i:|ⁱ|
|:^j:|ʲ|
|:^k:|ᵏ|
|:^l:|ˡ|
|:^m:|ᵐ|
|:^n:|ⁿ|
|:^o:|ᵒ|
|:^p:|ᵖ|
|:^r:|ʳ|
|:^s:|ˢ|
|:^t:|ᵗ|
|:^u:|ᵘ|
|:^v:|ᵛ|
|:^w:|ʷ|
|:^x:|ˣ|
|:^y:|ʸ|
|:^z:|ᶻ|

Note the missing superscript q.

### Latin lowercase subscripts
| Trigger | Replace |
| ------- | ------- |
|:_a:|ₐ|
|:_e:|ₑ|
|:_h:|ₕ|
|:_i:|ᵢ|
|:_j:|ⱼ|
|:_k:|ₖ|
|:_l:|ₗ|
|:_m:|ₘ|
|:_n:|ₙ|
|:_o:|ₒ|
|:_p:|ₚ|
|:_r:|ᵣ|
|:_s:|ₛ|
|:_t:|ₜ|
|:_u:|ᵤ|
|:_v:|ᵥ|
|:_x:|ₓ|

### Subscript digits and special characters
| Trigger | Replace |
| ------- | ------- |
|:_0:|₀|
|:_1:|₁|
|:_2:|₂|
|:_3:|₃|
|:_4:|₄|
|:_5:|₅|
|:_6:|₆|
|:_7:|₇|
|:_8:|₈|
|:_9:|₉|
|:_(:|₍|
|:_):|₎|
|:_+:|₊|
|:_-:|₋|

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:

  #
  #   ARROWS
  #

  # right arrow       
  - trigger: ":to:"
    replace: "⟶"
            
  # right arrow          
  - trigger: ":arrow_right:"
    replace: "⟶"      
            
  # left arrow           
  - trigger: ":ot:"
    replace: "⟵"
            
  # left arrow          
  - trigger: ":arrow_left:"
    replace: "⟵"
            
  # upwards arrow        
  - trigger: ":arrow_up:"
    replace: "↑"
            
  # downwards arrow         
  - trigger: ":arrow_down:"
    replace: "↓"
            
  # left and right arrow        
  - trigger: ":arrow_left_and_right:"
    replace: "⇄"
            
  # leftrightarrow        
  - trigger: ":arrow_leftright:"
    replace: "⟷"
            
  # short right arrow        
  - trigger: ":to_short:"
    replace: "→"
            
  # epimorphism         
  - trigger: ":epi:"
    replace: "↠"
            
  # backwards epimorphism        
  - trigger: ":epi_left:"
    replace: "↞"
            
  # monomorphism
  - trigger: ":mono:"
    replace: "⮩"
            
  # backwards monomorphism
  - trigger: ":mono_left:"
    replace: "⮨"
            
  # acts
  - trigger: ":acts:"
    replace: "↷"
            
  # backwards acts
  - trigger: ":acts_left:"
    replace: "↶"
            
  # auto          
  - trigger: ":auto:"
    replace: "⟲"
            
  # isomorphism   
  - trigger: ":simto:"
    replace: "⭇"
            
  # backwards isomorphism
  - trigger: ":simot:"
    replace: "⭁"
            
  # open embedding            
  - trigger: ":emb_open:"
    replace: "⇴"
            
  # closed embedding
  - trigger: ":emb_closed:"
    replace: "↛"
            
  # mapsto
  - trigger: ":mapsto:"
    replace: "⟼"
            
  # short mapsto  
  - trigger: ":mapsto_short:"
    replace: "↦"
            
  # rrarrow
  - trigger: ":rrarrow:"
    replace: "⇉"
            
  # rrrarrow 
  - trigger: ":rrrarrow:"
    replace: "⇶"
            
  # arroww
  - trigger: ":arroww:"
    replace: "⟹"
            
  # arrowww  
  - trigger: ":arrowww:"
    replace: "⇛"
            
  # squiggly arrow 
  - trigger: ":arrow_squiggly:"
    replace: "⇝"
            
  # left squiggly arrow
  - trigger: ":arrow_squiggly_left:"
    replace: "⇜"
            
  # long squiggly arrow
  - trigger: ":arrow_squiggly_long:"
    replace: "⟿"
            
  #
  #   LOGICS & CATEGORY THEORY
  #
            
  # forall
  - trigger: ":forall:"
    replace: "∀"
            
  # exists
  - trigger: ":exists:"
    replace: "∃"
            
  # doesn't exist
  - trigger: ":not_exists:"
    replace: "∄"
            
  # not equal
  - trigger: ":not_equals:"
    replace: "≠"

  # logical and
  - trigger: ":and:"
    replace: "∧"

  # logical or
  - trigger: ":or:"
    replace: "∨"

  # logical xor
  - trigger: ":xor:"
    replace: "⩛"

  # logical not
  - trigger: ":not:"
    replace: "¬"

  # implies
  - trigger: ":impl:"
    replace: "⇒"
                
  # simeq
  - trigger: ":simeq:"
    replace: "⋍"
            
  # not simeq
  - trigger: ":not_simeq:"
    replace: "≄"
            
  # cong
  - trigger: ":cong:"
    replace: "≌"
            
  # coloneqq
  - trigger: ":coloneqq:"
    replace: "≔"
            
  # eqqcolon
  - trigger: ":eqqcolon:"
    replace: "≕"
            
  # leq
  - trigger: ":leq:"
    replace: "≦"
            
  # geq
  - trigger: ":geq:"
    replace: "≧"
            
  # ladj
  - trigger: ":ladj:"
    replace: "⊣"
            
  # radj
  - trigger: ":radj:"
    replace: "⊢"
  
  # times
  - trigger: ":times:"
    replace: "×"

  # point
  - trigger: ":point:"
    replace: "∗"

  # circ
  - trigger: ":circ:"
    replace: "∘"

  # product
  - trigger: ":prod:"
    replace: "∏"
            
  # coproduct
  - trigger: ":coprod:"
    replace: "∐"
            
  # sum
  - trigger: ":sum:"
    replace: "∑"

  #
  #  SET THEORY
  #
            
  # intersection
  - trigger: ":cap:"
    replace: "∩"
            
  # union
  - trigger: ":cup:"
    replace: "∪"
            
  # empty set
  - trigger: ":empty:"
    replace: "∅"
            
  # element
  - trigger: ":in:"
    replace: "∈"
            
  # not element
  - trigger: ":not_in:"
    replace: "∉"
            
  # backwards element
  - trigger: ":ni:"
    replace: "∋"
            
  # backwards not element
  - trigger: ":not_ni:"
    replace: "∌"
            
  # subset
  - trigger: ":subset:"
    replace: "⊂"
            
  # superset
  - trigger: ":superset:"
    replace: "⊃"                 

  #
  #   GREEK
  #
            
  # alpha
  - trigger: ":alpha:"
    replace: "α"
            
  # Alpha
  - trigger: ":Alpha:"
    replace: "Α"
            
  # beta
  - trigger: ":beta:"
    replace: "β"
            
  # Beta
  - trigger: ":Beta:"
    replace: "Β"
            
  # gamma
  - trigger: ":gamma:"
    replace: "γ"
            
  # Gamma
  - trigger: ":Gamma:"
    replace: "Γ"
            
  # delta
  - trigger: ":delta:"
    replace: "δ"
            
  # Delta
  - trigger: ":Delta:"
    replace: "Δ"
            
  # epsilon
  - trigger: ":epsilon:"
    replace: "ε"
            
  # Epsilon
  - trigger: ":Epsilon:"
    replace: "Ε"
            
  # zeta
  - trigger: ":zeta:"
    replace: "ζ"
            
  # Zeta
  - trigger: ":Zeta:"
    replace: "Ζ"
            
  # eta
  - trigger: ":eta:"
    replace: "η"
            
  # Eta
  - trigger: ":Eta:"
    replace: "Η"
            
  # theta
  - trigger: ":theta:"
    replace: "θ"
            
  # Theta
  - trigger: ":Theta:"
    replace: "Θ"
            
  # iota
  - trigger: ":iota:"
    replace: "ι"
            
  # Iota
  - trigger: ":Iota:"
    replace: "Ι"
            
  # kappa
  - trigger: ":kappa:"
    replace: "κ"
            
  # Kappa
  - trigger: ":Iota:"
    replace: "Κ"
            
  # lambda
  - trigger: ":lambda:"
    replace: "λ"
            
  # Lambda
  - trigger: ":Lambda:"
    replace: "Λ"
            
  # mu
  - trigger: ":mu:"
    replace: "μ"
            
  # Mu
  - trigger: ":Mu:"
    replace: "Μ"
            
  # nu
  - trigger: ":nu:"
    replace: "ν"
            
  # Nu
  - trigger: ":Nu:"
    replace: "Ν"
            
  # xi
  - trigger: ":xi:"
    replace: "ξ"
            
  # Xi
  - trigger: ":Xi:"
    replace: "Ξ"
            
  # omicron
  - trigger: ":omicron:"
    replace: "ο"
            
  # Omicron
  - trigger: ":Omicron:"
    replace: "Ο"
            
  # pi
  - trigger: ":pi:"
    replace: "π"
            
  # Pi
  - trigger: ":Pi:"
    replace: "Π"
            
  # rho
  - trigger: ":rho:"
    replace: "ρ"
            
  # Rho
  - trigger: ":Rho:"
    replace: "Ρ"
            
  # sigma
  - trigger: ":sigma:"
    replace: "σ"
            
  # Sigma
  - trigger: ":Sigma:"
    replace: "Σ"
            
  # tau
  - trigger: ":tau:"
    replace: "τ"
            
  # Tau
  - trigger: ":Tau:"
    replace: "Τ"
            
  # upsilon
  - trigger: ":upsilon:"
    replace: "υ"
            
  # Upsilon
  - trigger: ":Upsilon:"
    replace: "Υ"
            
  # phi
  - trigger: ":phi:"
    replace: "φ"
            
  # varphi
  - trigger: ":varphi:"
    replace: "ϕ"
            
  # Phi
  - trigger: ":Phi:"
    replace: "Φ"
            
  # chi
  - trigger: ":chi:"
    replace: "χ"         
  
  # Chi
  - trigger: ":Chi:"
    replace: "Χ"
            
  # psi
  - trigger: ":psi:"
    replace: "ψ"
            
  # Psi
  - trigger: ":Psi:"
    replace: "Ψ"
            
  # omega
  - trigger: ":omega:"
    replace: "ω"
            
  # Omega
  - trigger: ":Omega:"
    replace: "Ω"
            
  #
  #  Sub and Superscripts
  #
            
  # subscript numbers
  - trigger: ":_0:"
    replace: "₀"
            
  - trigger: ":_1:"
    replace: "₁"
            
  - trigger: ":_2:"
    replace: "₂"
            
  - trigger: ":_3:"
    replace: "₃"
            
  - trigger: ":_4:"
    replace: "₄"
            
  - trigger: ":_5:"
    replace: "₅"
            
  - trigger: ":_6:"
    replace: "₆"
            
  - trigger: ":_7:"
    replace: "₇"
            
  - trigger: ":_8:"
    replace: "₈"
            
  - trigger: ":_9:"
    replace: "₉"

  # subscript extra symbols

  - trigger: ":_(:"
    replace: "₍"

  - trigger: ":_):"
    replace: "₎"

  - trigger: ":_+:"
    replace: "₊"
  
  - trigger: ":_-:"
    replace: "₋"

  # Latin lowercase superscripts
            
  - trigger: ":^a:"
    replace: "ᵃ"
            
  - trigger: ":^b:"
    replace: "ᵇ"
            
  - trigger: ":^c:"
    replace: "ᶜ"
            
  - trigger: ":^d:"
    replace: "ᵈ"
            
  - trigger: ":^e:"
    replace: "ᵉ"
            
  - trigger: ":^f:"
    replace: "ᶠ"
            
  - trigger: ":^g:"
    replace: "ᵍ"
            
  - trigger: ":^h:"
    replace: "ʰ"
            
  - trigger: ":^i:"
    replace: "ⁱ"
            
  - trigger: ":^j:"
    replace: "ʲ"
            
  - trigger: ":^k:"
    replace: "ᵏ"
            
  - trigger: ":^l:"
    replace: "ˡ"
            
  - trigger: ":^m:"
    replace: "ᵐ"
            
  - trigger: ":^n:"
    replace: "ⁿ"
            
  - trigger: ":^o:"
    replace: "ᵒ"   
            
  - trigger: ":^p:"
    replace: "ᵖ"     
            
  - trigger: ":^r:"
    replace: "ʳ"
            
  - trigger: ":^s:"
    replace: "ˢ"
            
  - trigger: ":^t:"
    replace: "ᵗ"
            
  - trigger: ":^u:"
    replace: "ᵘ"
            
  - trigger: ":^v:"
    replace: "ᵛ"
            
  - trigger: ":^w:"
    replace: "ʷ"
            
  - trigger: ":^x:"
    replace: "ˣ"
            
  - trigger: ":^y:"
    replace: "ʸ"
            
  - trigger: ":^z:"
    replace: "ᶻ"

  #
  # miscellaneous
  #


  # double slash          
  - trigger: ":doubleslash:"
    replace: "⫽"

  # qed symbol          
  - trigger: ":qed:"
    replace: "□"

  # Č         
  - trigger: ":vC:"
    replace: "Č"

  # mid
  - trigger: ":mid:"
    replace: "∣"
            
  # not mid
  - trigger: ":not_mid:"
    replace: "∤"
            
  # infinity
  - trigger: ":infty:"
    replace: "∞"

  - trigger: ":^infty:"
    replace: " ᪲"

  # acute e
  - trigger: ":e_acute:"
    replace: "é"
              
  # etale letters
            
  - trigger: ":etale:"
    replace: "étale"

  - trigger: ":et:"
    replace: "ét"    
            
  - trigger: ":^et:"
    replace: "ᵉᵗ"
            
  - trigger: ":_et:"
    replace: "ₑₜ"
